text: Craig Leo Stansberry (born March 8, 1982 in Dammam, Saudi Arabia) is an American baseball player. He is a third baseman for the San Diego Padres of Major League Baseball (MLB). Stansberry is the first baseball player born in Saudi Arabia to play for a Major League Baseball team. == Other websites == * Player profile at MLB.com Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:American baseball players
title: Craig Stansberry
